org.ambraproject.rhino.content.xml

Class ArticleXml

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ambraproject.rhino.content.xml.AbstractXpathReader
      • org.ambraproject.rhino.content.xml.AbstractArticleXml<org.ambraproject.models.Article>
        • org.ambraproject.rhino.content.xml.ArticleXml

  • public class ArticleXml
extends AbstractArticleXml<org.ambraproject.models.Article>
    An NLM-format XML document that can be "ingested" to build an Article object.

      • build

                                      throws XmlContentException
        Build an object from the XML supplied to this object.
        Specified by:
        build in class AbstractArticleXml<org.ambraproject.models.Article>
        Parameters:
        article - the object to modify, typically empty or mostly empty
        Returns:
        the same object with values inserted
        Throws:

      • parseRelatedArticles

        public List<org.ambraproject.models.ArticleRelationship> parseRelatedArticles()
        Parse ArticleRelationship objects from XML.

        These are returned from here, rather than set in the Article object during normal parsing, so they can get special handling.

        Returns:
        the article relationships defined by the XML
